footnote:
</br><hr style="border-top:1px solid #0778be"/>1 This word was substituted for the word "Director" by Mah. 52 of 1973, s. 3, Sch.
</br><hr style="border-top:1px solid #0778be"/>
content:
The <sup>1</sup>[Commissioner], Collector or any officer duly empowered may arrest, without an order from a
magistrate and without warrant, any person who obstructs him in the execution of his duty under this
Act, or who has escaped or attempts to escape from custody in which he has been or is lawfully
detained under this Act. </br>
